name: Avenue Right
tag_list: media-buying, media-planning, media-buying-software, media-buying-services, local-advertising, radio-advertising, television-advertising, online-advertising, print-advertising
overview:
Advertising technology company Avenue Right offers a modern, affordable solution to an old problem in the advertising industry - how to plan and buy media more efficiently and effectively, across media channels.

Avenue Right’s web-based software streamlines the media buying process for small to midsized businesses and ad agencies through transparency and simplicity.

The platform connects media buyers and sellers in real-time, providing the tools agencies need to gather, analyze, and act on information about an advertising marketplace, saving time through automation. Tools that were once exclusive to large media buyers with multi-million dollar budgets are now available to the thousands of small to mid-sized ad agencies that buy online and offline media in local and regional markets.

The leader in media buying automation, Avenue Right’s platform is unbiased, media agnostic, and takes no commission on the buys.

milestones.description: Radio Advertising Bureau President & CEO Jeff Haley Joins Avenue Right Board of Directors
Avenue Right Releases Version 3.0 of Media Buying Automation Platform
